001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
008
009public class OneShotRegime implements Regime {
010
011    @Override
012    public <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer, int step) {
013        if (step != 1) {
014            throw new IllegalStateException("Steps must be 1 but was " + step);
015        }
016        optimizer.optimize(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, 1);
017    }
018
019}
